title: A bill to modernize the Federal Housing Administration to meet the housing needs of the American people.
content: st Century Housing Act - Amends the Housing Act of 1948 to authorize the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development, in carrying out any program through the Federal Housing Administration, to: (1) appoint and fix the compensation of Administration personnel. And (2) use premium-generated income for information technology upgrades. Amends the National Housing Act to: (1) extend the maturity term for insured mortgages. (2) revise mortgage insurance eligibility criteria and requirements for premium charges, (3) authorize waiver of certain requirements for new product initiatives. (4) increase the maximum mortgage amount limit for multifamily housing in high-cost areas. And (5) increase the capital ratio for the Mutual Mortgage Insurance Fund.
